ops.description: fadeScreen({r:12, g:255, b:255, speed:255, type:1}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:12, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:32}); // unused=0
fadeScreen({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:0, type:0}); // unused=0

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:1}); // {Cloud}
Sephiroth's energy barrier is gone

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:2}); // {Cloud}
{Cid}!
Can the Airship get inside?

ops.raw: a5 00 00 ae ff 2d f4 d7 fc 5a 00
a5 00 00 d4 ff 81 f5 d7 fc 5f 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:42}); // {Cloud}
Okay then!
We'll parachute into Midgar!!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 2f ff ba f4 d7 fc 44 00
a5 00 00 2f ff ba f4 d7 fc 44 00
a5 00 00 2f ff ba f4 d7 fc 44 00
a5 00 00 2f ff ba f4 d7 fc 44 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:10}); // {Barret}
YO! Do somethin'!
Ya big cat!
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:12}); // Too late tryin' to hide it now

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:8}); // {Cloud}
Can't you stop the Mako reactor?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:13}); // {Barret}
You're from Shinra, ain't ya?
So why's it impossible!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:37}); // {Barret}
Even if we get there,
Midgar's under martial law!{PAUSE}There'll be no way
we could slip into the slums.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:38}); // {Tifa}
Looks like all transportation
from the slums is cut off

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:5}); // {Cid}
Huh?
He's my pilot, ain't he!?
Of course he can go anywhere!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:35}); // {Cid}
I'm leaving the ship in your hands!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:16}); // {Cid}
We came a long way to get here.
You better not double-cross us now!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:17}); // {Cid}
You damn fool!
Don't you understand anything I'm saying?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:18}); // I don't give a damn about Shinra.
If you're a man no, if you're a human being,
you'll save the planet!
Don't you even care?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:19}); // {Cid}
Why?
Can't you just shut off the valve?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:39}); // {Cid}
Hey, hey, whaddya think
we have Highwind for?{PAUSE}Where are we now!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:41}); // {Cid}
If land's no go
We'll go by air!

ops.raw: a5 00 00 a3 ff a3 f3 d7 fc 3a 00
a5 00 00 a3 ff a3 f3 d7 fc 3a 00

ops.description:
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:7}); // {Cait Sith}
Scarlet!
Heidegger!
What's going on?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:20}); // {Cait Sith}
We're sunk.
Hojo's doing this on his own
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:22}); // I don't like this

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:23}); // {Cait Sith}
Forget thatthe CANNON!
We've got to get to Midgar!
That's the first thing!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:33}); // {Cait Sith}
But!{PAUSE}But you'll come, won't you!?

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:24}); // {Cait Sith}
We can't stop it.

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:26}); // {Cait Sith}
I can't make you trust me

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:27}); // {Cait Sith}
No way! If we shut down the reactor,
all hell will break loose!!

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:28}); // {Cait Sith}
Yeah, it's easy to shut off
the reactor's pipe valves

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:29}); // But the reactor made a path for the energy
to escape from below.{PAUSE}Once you open that,
it'll be impossible to close it
until everything blasts out

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:30}); // And we can't try to stop the energy
from gushing out

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:31}); // {Cait Sith}
This blast'll be way stronger than
when the Sector 1 Reactor blew up!
showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:36}); // I'm heading for Midgar!

dialogStrings:
{Cid}
Huh?
He's my pilot, ain't he!?
Of course he can go anywhere!
Too late tryin' to hide it now

{Barret}
You're from Shinra, ain't ya?
So why's it impossible!?

{Cid}
We came a long way to get here.
You better not double-cross us now!

{Cid}
You damn fool!
Don't you understand anything I'm saying?

I don't give a damn about Shinra.
If you're a man no, if you're a human being,
you'll save the planet!
Don't you even care?

{Cid}
Why?
Can't you just shut off the valve?

{Cait Sith}
We're sunk.
Hojo's doing this on his own

{Cait Sith}
Forget thatthe CANNON!
We've got to get to Midgar!
That's the first thing!!

{Cait Sith}
I can't make you trust me

{Cait Sith}
No way! If we shut down the reactor,
all hell will break loose!!

{Cait Sith}
Yeah, it's easy to shut off
the reactor's pipe valves

But the reactor made a path for the energy
to escape from below.{PAUSE}Once you open that,
it'll be impossible to close it
until everything blasts out

And we can't try to stop the energy
from gushing out

{Cait Sith}
This blast'll be way stronger than
when the Sector 1 Reactor blew up!

{Cid}
I'm leaving the ship in your hands!

{Barret}
Even if we get there,
Midgar's under martial law!{PAUSE}There'll be no way
we could slip into the slums.

{Tifa}
Looks like all transportation
from the slums is cut off

{Cid}
Hey, hey, whaddya think
we have Highwind for?{PAUSE}Where are we now!?

{Cid}
If land's no go
We'll go by air!
